com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi

Interface ConnectionFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Exclusive<ConnectionFactory>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicConnector

    public interface ConnectionFactory
extends Exclusive<ConnectionFactory>

    This interface defines the API for establishing and utilizing connections with other nodes, abstracting the underlying socket usage.

    Author:
    Carter Waxman

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ConnectionFactory.Connection
      This interface defines the functionality for utilizing a connection with a RemoteNode.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionFactory.Connection getConnection(RemoteNode node)
      Retrieves a Connection that can be used for communication with the RemoteNode.
      ConnectionFactory.Connection registerConnection(java.net.Socket s)
      Registers an existing socket connection to the connection manager.

    • Method Detail

      • registerConnection

        ConnectionFactory.Connection registerConnection(java.net.Socket s)

        Registers an existing socket connection to the connection manager. This is provided to allow incoming connections to register so that sockets may be reused.

        Parameters:
        s - The open socket.
        Returns:
        The new connection object utilizing the socket.

      • getConnection

        ConnectionFactory.Connection getConnection(RemoteNode node)
                                           throws java.io.IOException

        Retrieves a Connection that can be used for communication with the RemoteNode.

        Parameters:
        node - The node to connect to.
        Returns:
        A Connection that can be used for communication with the RemoteNode.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
